description: Giorgio Armani launched his first eponymous menswear collection in 1974. Today, he is one of Italy's foremost and most esteemed designers, not least because of his unique eye for fit and talent for tailoring. The Giorgio Armani label remains the mainstay of the Armani fashion house offering both exclusive soft tailoring and luxurious sportswear and functional clothing, always with a particular focus on fit, craftsmanship and materials.
